advantages.name: Ally:
advantages.desc: A mortal, group or organization who assists you each point taken increases their loyalty and capability.

flaws.name: Enemy:
flaws.desc: A mortal, group or organization who is aware of you and actively working against you. Each point taken increases their fervor and capability. Enemies are rated two dots lower than allies. A 1 dot enemy is equivalent to a 3 dot ally.

advantages.name: Contact:
advantages.desc: Someone who can help you with a specific task, be it a camarilla insider, police dispatcher or shady merchant. Each dot increases their level of usefulness.

advantages.name: Fame
advantages.desc: You are a known and liked name in your community. Each dot increases the scale of your fame and reach.

flaws.name: Infamy:
flaws.desc: You are infamous for some wicked deed. Add each dot of this flaw to the difficulty of your reaction role. A severe flaw may lead to pursuit from authorities.

flaws.name: Dark Secret:
flaws.desc: A milder version of infamy, you have a terrible secret that would harm your reputation if it got out.

flaws.name: Dark Secret: Cleaver
flaws.desc: You are known to routinely violate the masquerade, you likely have been run out of other domains and are not long to last here either.

flaws.name: Debt
flaws.desc: You owe a debt to the wrong people. Alternatively, your spouse, lover or other close relations has 2 dots of infamy.

advantages.name: Influence
advantages.desc: You have pull with the mortals of your domain. How much respect and reach you have grow with every dot of influence.

flaws.name: Despised
flaws.desc: A group of mortals in your city lives solely to hinder you in any way possible. Subtract 2 die from any rolls to convince neutral parties to support you.

flaws.name: Disliked
flaws.desc: A group of mortals in your city lives solely to hinder you in any way possible. Subtract 1 die from any rolls to convince neutral parties to support you. (Does not effect contacts or allies)

advantages.name: Herd
advantages.desc: You have assembled a group of mortals from which you regularly and easily feed. They are also capable of performing menial tasks for you, though not loyally. Your first dot awards 1-3 mortals. Each dot essentially doubles the size of your herd

flaws.name: Obvious Predator
flaws.desc: You exude danger. All humans instinctively mistrust you. Lose two dice from any dice pool from any non-physical skills used for hunting

advantages.name: Mask
advantages.desc: Each dot of mask strengthens the level of your fake identity. Choose a max of 2 dots. At 2 dots, you may purchase additional related 1 dot merits.

advantages.name: Zeroed
advantages.desc: REQUIRES 2 dots of Mask: Someone highup has removed all trace of your government records, you do not legally exist.

advantages.name: Cobbler
advantages.desc: REQUIRES 2 dots of Mask: You are capable of creating or sourcing masks for others. Each mask takes 3 days per dot to create, 1 to source with an additional cost chosen by your ST.

flaws.name: Known Blankbody
flaws.desc: Your biography is known to several government agencies. It would not be difficult for any inquisitor to realize what you are.

flaws.name: Known Corpse
flaws.desc: People and government agencies know you have died recently. Appearing otherwise is bound to frighten them.

advantages.name: Mawla:
advantages.desc: Each dot of a mawla represents the strength of one or more kindred who are looking out for you. One dot would be a neonate, five would be your local prince.

flaws.name: Adversary:
flaws.desc: Each dot represents a fellow kindred who wishes you ill, max 3 dots. One dot represents an elder, three would be a local Prince or Baron.

advantages.name: Resources
advantages.desc: Each dot of resources grows your wealth, one dot of resources might equal a minimum wage worker, where five would put you on par with Jeff Bezos.

advantages.name: Retainer:
advantages.desc: Range: 1-3 dots. With each dot your retainer grows more capable. 1 dot = weak mortal, 2 dot = average ghoul, 3 dot = gifted ghoul

flaws.name: Stalker:
flaws.desc: A former retainer is obsessed with you, should you deal with one another emerges.

advantages.name: Status
advantages.desc: Range: 1-5 dots. With every dot your level of respect and privilege amongst your sect grows.

flaws.name: Shunned
flaws.desc: You are hated by your local sect. You wronged them and they will do what they can to work against you.

flaws.name: Suspect
flaws.desc: You're disliked by your local sect. Suffer a two-die penalty to social tests with your faction.
